game.name: Soldiers Combat
game.description: Soldiers Combat is a action packed game with 8 LevelsTo clear each level you have to collect hidden keys which you can get under a box or from enemies. Collect more and more coins to unlock awesome guns and charactersUse Machine gun, bazooka, heat and cold gun to destroy the enemies.Be a real soldier. Start playing "Soldiers Combat"
